name: Color Squares (UNTITLEDPOGGER)
description:
Instructions

A / D to Move

If on mobile press the computer button on the menu to switch to mobile mode

Only touch matching squares

----------------------------------

Modes

Easy Size 85 Spawn 1

Medium Size 90 Spawn 0.85

Hard Size 100 Spawn 0.5

Expert Size 125 Spawn 0.3
